We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

There’s no better time to upgrade your sleep setup than Black Friday and Cyber Monday — two of the biggest sale events of the year. As usual, there are tons of great deals on top-rated mattresses, from trusted names like Tempur-Pedic and Mattress Firm to direct-to-consumer favorites like Purple and Naturepedic. We recommend taking advantage of all these sleep brands impressive sales, especially since a majority of them have already started. Yup, weeks ahead of schedule!

With the holidays and cozy winter nights coming up, it’s the perfect time to treat yourself to the sleep you deserve. Whether you’re into memory foam, hybrids, pillow tops, or organic latex mattresses, we’ve got you covered. Check out our top picks from the sales so far, and make sure to save this list and give it another look as we get closer to the actual Black Friday event (the day after Thanksgiving!).

Amazon — Amazon’s Black Friday deals have officially kicked off. If you’re a Prime member, you’ll save even more with these exclusive deals.

Saatva — We’re big fans of Saatva’s Classic Mattress. And psst — you can get it at $300 off (and the discount applies to any order of $1,000 or more, too).

Casper — During the Black Friday Sale sale, score 30% off all mattresses. We found Casper’s Nova Hybrid Snow Mattress to be ideal for hot sleepers.

Nolah — Enjoy 35% off sitewide and receive two free fluffy pillows with a mattress purchase. Nolah mattresses may be called “the best for side-sleepers,” but one of our editors found the responsive pressure relief system to support all sleep styles. 

Minocasa — Get up to 60% off mattresses and get two free pillows with your order.

Bear — Take 35% off sitewide and get two free Cirrus Cloud Pillows with the code BLACK35. Read why we love its Pro Mattress and Elite Hybrid Mattress. 

Molecule — Enjoy up to 30% off select items. Use the code BFSLEEP at checkout. You can also read our review of Molecule’s super-cooling Molecule 1 Mattress here.

Helix — With the code BF25, score 25% off sitewide, plus three free products with Helix Luxe or Elite mattress purchase (two Dream pillows, a sheet set, and a mattress protector). Read our review of the Helix Midnight LUXE mattress to see why we recommend it.

Birch — Get 25% off Birch’s entire site with the code BF25 and get two free Eco-Rest pillows with the purchase of any mattress. Our commerce editor also reviewed the Luxe Natural mattress (and loved it), if you need a place to start! 

Stearns & Foster — Save up to $600 on these highly-coveted mattresses. This is the brand that made our home director switch back to a spring mattress, and our commerce deputy editor said the Estate Mattress is the one of her dreams.

Floyd — Score 20% off bedding and mattresses during the brand’s Pre-Black Friday Sale. Read our editor’s review of The Sectional and The Mattress.

Eight Sleep — Get up to $400 off the most technologically advanced mattress available: the Pod Ulta 4 Mattress. Its internal heating and cooling system automatically adjusts to make sure you always have the most comfortable sleeping experience. Read our review of the original Pod Pro here.

Beautyrest — Now’s your chance to save up to $1,000 on some of the most luxurious, high-quality mattresses and base sets. This sale includes the top-rated Harmony Lux and Harmony Lux Hybrid mattresses, as well as the AT editor-loved Beautyrest Black mattress.

PlushBeds — Enjoy up to $1,250 off and get $599 worth of bedding with your mattress purchase. And did you know the Natural Bliss mattress made our list for Best Vegan Mattresses?

Plank — Score 30% off PlankFirm and PlankFirm Luxe mattresses with code BFRIDAY30.

Titan — Score 30% off Titan Plus, Titan Plus Luxe, and Titan Plus Elite mattresses with code BFRIDAY30.

Serta — Score up to $800 off select mattresses and select adjustable base sets.

Mattress Firm — Snag big deals — as much as $700 off — on quality, name-brand mattresses and get a free adjustable base.

Brentwood Home — Take 10% off sitewide, as well as free shipping and a year-long mattress trial.

Amerisleep — Save $500 on all of Amerisleep’s mattress models. Each is made with Bio-Pur, an upgrade to traditional memory foam that is more breathable and made entirely from plants.

PLUSHBEDS — Enjoy 50% off mattresses and get $599 worth of free bedding of your choice with your purchase.

DreamCloud — Enjoy up to 50% off all mattresses starting at $665.

Vaya — Use promo code VAYA300 to get $300 off Vaya, Pillow, and Hybrid mattresses.

Big Fig — With the code BFPREVIEW, take $500 off its Big Fig Mattress — which has a free 120-day sleep trial and is AT-approved.

My Green Mattress — Get up to $300 off mattresses and 15% off bedding and bases. That includes My Green Mattress’s certified organic mattresses, organic cotton sheet sets, organic cotton mattress protectors, platform bed frames, and more! We recommend the editor-tested Natural Escape Mattress.

Zoma — Use code SLEEP25 to save $25% off mattresses and get free shipping and returns.

Siena — Save 50% on Siena’s mattresses. Plus, you get a 180-night free trial to decide whether you love your new mattress or not.

Happsy — Make sure you use code BLACKFRIDAY to get 20% off sitewide, which includes an organic mattress made with sustainably-harvested and environmentally-friendly materials.
